title: Game Progress Route
content:
d it was too late for the ones that he was supposed to be protecting. He surrendered and even welcomed the Absolute, he said.

If you wanted power, you never needed a god- only to live up to your ideal. 'For a moment'- until you realized your reward would be a tadpole. It sounds like you were being enthralled. It's not your fault. Your people didn't need a paladin- they saved themselves.

After this, he is aware of the battle that lies ahead and will offer his help. He tells you that Ketheric is
